p: If species-specific population growth is influenced by climatic factors, the community composition will be indirectly affected as well. To examine how climate influences community composition, we used linear regression analysis between the community composition change rate, SlnÎ», and 6 different climatic factors (Tavg-annual mean temperature, Tmax-maximum temperature, Tmin-minimum temperature, Pavg-annual precipitation, Pmax-maximum precipitation and Pmin-minimum precipitation).
